children.text: Handle digital movement
Update player's current angle variable if player is moving or aiming (otherwise, keep last value)
Switch animation according to player aim/movement angle
Do movement if needed
Calculate movement speed: normal / carrying + additional slow effect if needed
If player is aiming, set movement speed to 0
Move player and damage them with dt
If player is not carrying a box, use normal animation speed
If player is carrying a box, use slowed down animation speed
If player is not moving, stop & switch to standing frame
If player has a box, update it's position & angle

parameters.x: Player.X + cos(anglelerp(angle(Player.X, Player.Y, Self.X, Self.Y), Player.currentAngle, 0.2)) * Player.R_Box_Distance
parameters.y: Player.Y + sin(anglelerp(angle(Player.X, Player.Y, Self.X, Self.Y), Player.currentAngle, 0.2)) * Player.R_Box_Distance

children.text: todo_optimize updates
If player is already in the game...
If player is not aiming, reveal current tile if possible
If player is not waiting for tiles closing
Open new tile
If player has two tiles open, check them for matches
If player is aiming, throw box
If player is not in the game yet, spawn them
If symbols match...
If symbol is an item...
If item is health, heal immediately
Otherwise pick up item
If symbol is not an item...
Check win condition
If symbols don't match, start close timer
If player is out of health, kill them
Close tiles opened by player
Remove box from player (so it can be picked up by others)
Check if there are any other non-dead players
Otherwise, heal / damage
Heal effects
Big heal SFX
Small heal SFX
Damage effects & start invincibility

parameters.message: "Setting animation of player #" & Player.playerId & " to " & (Player.playerId & "_" & animationName)
